snippet: Some college basketball teams have been doing Navy SEALs-type preparation to serve as team bonding and fitness combined into one preseason regimen.
lead_paragraph: Some college basketball teams have been doing Navy SEALs-type preparation to serve as team bonding and fitness combined into one preseason regimen.

headline.main: Building Stamina and Spirit With Military-Style Training
headline.print_headline: Building Stamina and Spirit With Military-Style Training
